document_data.caption: A map showing Gelthoon Street and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Gelthoon Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Gelthoon Street''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Gelthoon Street was located in the southern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. Gelthoon Street branched south from [[Suldown Street]] and eventually ended on [[Golden Serpent Street]]. Other roads intersecting Gelthoon Street included [[Aveen Street]] and [[Brahiir's Street]].
